name: Strategic Diversion against the Lamanites
description: Helaman and Antipus devised a stratagem to mislead the Lamanites, leading them away from their stronghold while attempting to gain the upper hand. Helaman marched with his little sons near the city of Antiparah to simulate delivering provisions, while Antipus coordinated the main army to pursue the fleeing Lamanites after they were lured from their stronghold.

location.name: City of Antiparah
location.description: City where the strongest army of the Lamanites was stationed.
